page.title: 03Stansted Airport
page.content: After twenty years of arguing,it has been decided to develop Stansted Airport as London's third airport.The reason that it is to be developed is that it is near London and has a big enough runway to take Concorde and Jumbo Jets.At the moment they only take half a million people a year.Soon it will take seven or eight million people a year.The runway is so long because it was built during the war by the Americans to take large troop transport planes. By the year 2000 Stansted could be handling 15 million passengers a year. There have been four public inquiries but on 5th June 1985 it was announced that Stansted was to be developed.The people in the area are deeply concerned,as their way of life will be changed,but it will also bring many jobs to the area.
